title: James Hutton Mackenzie
text: James Hutton Mackenzie (27 September 1849–10 July 1949) was a New Zealand presbyterian minister. He was born in <a href="Thornhill%2C%20Dumfries%20and%20Galloway">Thornhill</a>, <a href="Dumfriesshire">Dumfriesshire</a>, <a href="Scotland">Scotland</a> on 27 September 1849.
